int tm_get_test_cases ( const char *  cfg_file,
DLList **  cases 
)

Get test cases from the script file.

Parameters:
scriptfile[in] config file from which test cases are extracted.
cases[out] for test cases returning.
Returns:
ENOERR or -1 in case of failure.
NOTE: This function is a part of Test Module API and it is called by TMC

Function that will be called once during loading of testmodule Function that will be called once during shutdown/closing of testmodule Implementation of tm_get_test_cases() for HardCoded test module.

Parameters:
cfg_file test case file
cases [out] list of test cases found in this module
Returns:
0 on success
Implementation of tm_get_test_cases for MINUnit

Function that will be called once during loading of testmodule Function that will be called once during shutdown/closing of testmodule tm_get_test_cases is used to inquire test cases from the Test Module. Test cases are stored to array of test cases. The Test Framework will be the owner of the data in the DLList after tm_get_test_cases return and it does the memory deallocation.

Function that will be called once during loading of testmodule Function that will be called once during shutdown/closing of testmodule

tm_get_test_cases is used to inquire test cases from the Test Module. Test cases are stored to array of test cases. The Test Framework will be the owner of the data in the DLList after tm_get_test_cases return and it does the memory deallocation.
